title: Installation issue: amrex +cuda
body:
The `amrex` package has an error where it uses `spec` instead of `self.spec`. This happens when installing `amrex +cuda`.

```
==> Installing amrex-21.01-x3ueyxgshtahu3d4ttstr7gvyp4adhol
==> No binary for amrex-21.01-x3ueyxgshtahu3d4ttstr7gvyp4adhol found: installing from source
==> Using cached archive: /home/eschnetter/src/CarpetX/spack/var/spack/cache/_source-cache/archive/59/59de3ed429347ee6a7ad4f09c0c431248f2e081f59c301db37cacb36993622f4.tar.gz
==> amrex: Executing phase: 'cmake'
==> Error: NameError: name 'spec' is not defined

/home/eschnetter/src/CarpetX/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/amrex/package.py:196, in cmake_args:
        193            args.append('-DAMReX_CUDA_ERROR_CAPTURE_THIS=ON')
        194            args.append('-DAMReX_CUDA_ERROR_CROSS_EXECUTION_SPACE_CALL=ON')
        195
  >>    196            cuda_arch = spec.variants['cuda_arch'].value
        197            if cuda_arch == 'none':
        198                args.append('-DAMReX_CUDA_ARCH=Auto')
        199            else:

See build log for details:
  /tmp/eschnetter/spack-stage/spack-stage-amrex-21.01-x3ueyxgshtahu3d4ttstr7gvyp4adhol/spack-build-out.txt
```
